message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you coming down to $120. However, I'm really looking to stay under $80. Would you be willing to consider $75?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay under $80, but I'm still hoping we can meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $100.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down again, but $100 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $85.  If we can agree on that, I'll take it off your hands.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go down to $85, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
